questionTitle: Why do they advertise their goods? To make ............................ spend their money.
Will the boy who has taken my pencil bring ................?
What can you buy in a supermarket? Many things, including ......................
Mr Smith has just bought a portable .........................
I understand that the picnic has been postponed . Well, the interest ................ was not very promising.
My sister spends a lot of money on food and on other things. She has a ................... habit.
"Why did you return so suddenly?" "Well, he demanded that I ................"
Mr Tam teaches us how to swim. He is a ..............................
It was difficult for Susan ............ the good news.
John was shocked .............. that he had failed the driving test.
Hardly ............... one problem when I was faced with another.
A pharmacist has to be careful in filling a(n) ............................
There ............ more than a thousand employees in the factory now.
If you need some aspirins, you can go to the ................... across the street.
